name: Add RSS feed posts to a Notion database

interface.help: Other RSS fields. All values are in text format.
interface.name: rssFields
interface.label: RSS fields

parts.text: Determine whether the title "{{1.title}}" is written in English or German. Respond only with "en" for English or "de" for German.

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.
spec.name: file_uri
spec.label: File URI

parts.text:
Here is the shortened English version of your prompt:

Extract German words from {{9.description}} and group them by CEFR (B1C2 only).
 Exclude A1/A2 and unknown-level words.
 For each word:
 Noun: add correct article + singular form
 Verb: use infinitive
 Adjective: use base form
 Give Turkish and English meanings.
 Group by level: B1, B2, C1, C2
 Format using only special characters (no text styling).
 Example:

 B1 
 der Unfall  kaza / accident

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.
spec.name: file_uri
spec.label: File URI
